name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident involving malicious script execution, privilege escalation, and data exfiltration attempts. The workflow includes steps to terminate malicious scripts, identify affected systems, and mitigate the issue.

action--7c1e6962-ba77-4d7f-8ed5-4e6486d2.name: Terminate all suspicious script processes
action--7c1e6962-ba77-4d7f-8ed5-4e6486d2.description: Terminate any processes that are executing suspicious scripts.

action--5e2f6875-139f-4d9a-909b-994ff48b.name: Identify affected systems
action--5e2f6875-139f-4d9a-909b-994ff48b.description: Scan the network to identify systems impacted by the malicious activities.

infected_hosts.description: List of infected hosts detected in the network.

action--3a94aed7-6a45-451d-b7cb-4948e8b5.name: Revoke escalated privileges
action--3a94aed7-6a45-451d-b7cb-4948e8b5.description: Revoke any escalated privileges if detected.

commands.command: if [[ escalated_privileges_detected ]]; then revoke_permissions --user compromised_user; fi

action--1d1b8ac4-46ea-4c85-abf6-74b6f80f.name: Scan and remove all malicious files
action--1d1b8ac4-46ea-4c85-abf6-74b6f80f.description: Find and remove all malicious files from the system.

loop-condition--f4b7bdb4-55d4-4741-82b5-.name: Repeat Scan Until Clean
loop-condition--f4b7bdb4-55d4-4741-82b5-.description: Loop to check the system for malicious files until no more are found.

action--b9d55ddc-e5a7-4c9a-9431-50782789.name: Deploy patch to all discovered hosts
action--b9d55ddc-e5a7-4c9a-9431-50782789.description: Deploy patches to all hosts identified as compromised.
